section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Legacy of the Fire Nation
paragraphs.text: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Legacy of The Fire Nation is a hardcover scrapbook published by Insight Edition, written by Joshua Pruett. The book follows Iroh sharing memories and mementos with Prince Zuko.

paragraphs.body: In Avatar: The Last Airbender: Legacy of the Fire Nation, discover long-kept secrets carried by Uncle Iroh as he records his stories for Prince Zuko. Read letters from family, friends, and more in this special collection of mementos and keepsakes.
section: Avatar: The Last Airbender: Legacy of the Fire Nation
paragraphs.text: In Avatar: The Last Airbender: Legacy of the Fire Nation, discover long-kept secrets carried by Uncle Iroh as he records his stories for Prince Zuko. Read letters from family, friends, and more in this special collection of mementos and keepsakes.

paragraphs.body: Iroh has held many roles in his long life including crown prince of the Fire Nation, mentor to Prince Zuko, and ally of Avatar Aang. In the peace following the end of the Hundred Year War, Iroh has compiled his many thoughts, memories, artifacts, and stories from his long life to share with Prince Zuko. Filled with amazing removable mementos from Iroh, Avatar: The Last Airbender: Legacy of the Fire Nation presents an exclusive look into one of the series’ most-loved characters.
